comment: If a vertex in a multigraph has degree 0, the vertex is not adjacent to another vertex via an edge. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 12-Dec-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Dec-2020.)
